website_summaries.verdict: PlayStation All-Stars' mix of playful franchise mash-ups and four-player battles fail to mesh with its complex fighting mechanics.
pros: Seeing your favorite Sony characters punch each other in the faceHumorous, well-designed levels that mash up franchisesFour-player battles with friends are funCross play support for on-the-go fighting on the Vita
cons: Complex battle system makes for a steep learning curveLacks the fluid feel of a great fighting gameHorrible, pixelated menu screensSome stills and a bit of voice-over do not make for a compelling character narrative

customer_reviews.title: One of the highest quality Vita games
customer_reviews.text: IF you have either played the PS3 version or if you like super smash bros then this game is perfect. Controls are responsive. The visuals are great. This is a must own for Vita owners. I wish there was a lot more quality games like this on the Vita.
customer_reviews.author: Reasonable Gamer

customer_reviews.title: It's not as good as Smash Brothers
customer_reviews.text: It's not as good as Smash Brothers, but I don't think it ever was meant to be. If you want to have some Smash action but don't own a Nintendo device, or you want to play Smash with your favorite Sony characters; especially if you don't want to spend a whole lot on it, this game is fine for you. For someone who's expecting the same experience as Smash, you're not going to get it. For the 5$ I paid, I'm not upset. I would probably be upset if I spent more than 10$, however.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great fighting game with a lot of depth
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected. I bought it to play for playing against friends, but was pleasantly surprised how fun it is to play solo. A lot of interesting characters from various franchises, and they carry the "special moves" from the original games. Interesting power ups and environmental hazards that spice up the game. Control scheme is actually well thought out, not the arcade remapping. Small downside: expensive to purchase DLC for additional characters; online mode is somewhat slow. Overall, highly recommend for Vita. Overall,
customer_reviews.author: L. Yin

customer_reviews.title: service was great but the game is only okay
customer_reviews.text: does a decent job of acting like smash bros and is a good game to play on the go but the menus look bland and cheap and the gameplay while fun gets stale fast against the ai since nobody plays it. also the harder ai are literally unfair to fight. there's also a lack of maps.
customer_reviews.author: snowman

customer_reviews.title: The game is fun. It's not quite Smash Brothers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game on sale for $5, and I might even pay the current price for it ($13) if I had to. The game is fun. It's not quite Smash Brothers, but it's a lot of fun. It can get a litttle repetitive if you play it for long lengths of time, but it is fun for a quick few matches here and there. My only complaint is that playing single player mode has a HUGE curve between the difficulties. Going up a difficulty goes from the game being too easy to having difficulty winning matches (or even having much fun)
customer_reviews.author: Stephan Starnes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome online 20 cool characters to play with Fun specials ...
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Awesome online 20 cool characters to play with Fun specials and power ups You can also get different costumes Many different levels Cons In multiplayer it is easy to get lost with everything going on Sometimes the online disconnects and is slow Note: To play on line you have to look on the back little paper that comes with the game and follow the instructions
customer_reviews.author: Korban Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Game
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game. It is a great game to just get for your ps vita, though if you get one for your friend or if your friend manages to get a copy it is an AD HOC supporting game allowing you to play anywhere you go. Fantastic game, but if you want this because it seems like nintendos super smash bros, then i am sad to say that it pales in comparison. However it is a great game if you own a vita and have to intention of getting either a wii U or 3ds
customer_reviews.author: Nightcrawler

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: More than I expected , I bought this for my Vita and didn't go into it expecting much , however I now find myself not been able to put it down . Its so much fun , its smash brothers but for the PlayStation fans . Online play is great I connected with no problems and game play online is flawless . Characters are great and its so much fun just seen all your favorite PlayStation characters in one game , I hope this series continues .
customer_reviews.author: FunFact

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Reminiscent of Super Smash Bros. I had a lot of fun with this game, especially loved the character roster.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: It's a bad game.
customer_reviews.text: Being a casual/professional player that knows the difference between a good and a fun game, I can say that this game barely passes the mark as being playable. The controls are blocky and none of the character's movesets are properly balanced. The amount of fun you'll get reading this is the same amount of fun you'd have playing Frogger using only your feet. And don't even get me started on the DLC. 10/10, would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Fun brawler
customer_reviews.text: Very fun fighting game that is similar to smash brothers in the brawl concept but definitely its own game. Kind of lacking characters with only 20 and a couple of dlc characters for a price. But the game is really entertaining especially if you're traveling or just want to pick up a game to play here and there. Overall would recommend it for both casual and hardcore fans of fighting games.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Really fun if you like the PlayStation characters.
customer_reviews.text: It's still the same Super Smash Brothers knock off, but at least it brings variety. The character selection is pretty good ranging from Nathan Drake to Kratos. Having Kratos fighting Nathan Drake sounds crazy, and let me tell you, it's pretty cool. It's pretty cool seeing two of my favorite characters fighting it out and killing each other. All in all, it's a pretty fun game and I'll recommend it to be part of your collection.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Fun game but....
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 3.5 stars I would. This is a good fighting game and brings in alot of PS characters (hence the name) to choose from. I enjoyed the many different online and offline fighting modes. However, the main boss was kinda goofy and I never really bought the story for how they are all "together" in this world. Not sure it needed a story, but one was added...probably should have skipped it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre fighting game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale, and to be honest I don't think it was worth it. If you like the characters then maybe, but the feeling is not fluid like Super Smash Bros, it rather feels quite rigid - attacks don't flow from one to another, you just kind of switch between them. And that just makes it not feel very fun. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: iDevGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great game but...
customer_reviews.text: You're better off buying the digital version for way less and with the online pass because the online code that comes with it will be expired. Game cost $3.99 on the PS store and $9.99 for the online pass. Just a heads up. Game is the same as the PS3 version. No complaints there.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: The game was new, but the online pass code ...
customer_reviews.text: The game was new, but the online pass code for the game has apparently already been used because it's no longer valid. This would've gotten 5 stars, but I bought the game for the sole intention of playing it online. Now I have to spend 10 more bucks for another code that should be provided with the game. What a rip off.
customer_reviews.author: Isky

customer_reviews.title: Stands on its own and worth a play if you enjoy similar titles
customer_reviews.text: many people will draw similarities to Smash Bros and dismiss this game as a copy. Really this game is great and can stand on its own. It has a different fighting system then SB and has its own positives and negatives. The knockouts are done by hitting a enemy with a special attack that is charged up by hitting the opponent with regular moves. The special attack has 3 levels that change the attack type, range, and duration, missing this attack means you feel like the work you did was a waste though.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D. Golden

customer_reviews.title: A great game in its own special way
customer_reviews.text: At $20 PSA felt like a huge steal, it has been entertaining both for short and long sessions. The only thing I would do is buy the PS3 Version so you have both versions for a single price. (only on new copies) I ended up ordering a ton of games to bring on a trip to europe & I found myself stuck to Battle Royale the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Miyo Kitano

customer_reviews.title: A lot like super smash
customer_reviews.text: The super smash Bros of PlayStation. You don't know what super smash is? Then stop playing videogames noob.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: Bad code in box
customer_reviews.text: Can't use the digital code for online with it says invalid even though the product was "new" So you was no help :(
customer_reviews.author: Steven L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent online gaming, Excellent game...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent game... First i didn't care much about this game.. but is very addictive.. and if you are a fan of playstation characters you must own this.. I already made a platinum trophy out of it.. Furthermore, is very entertaining and competitive when you play it online, you can play with a friend too.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Velez

customer_reviews.title: I don't enjoy it nearly as much as I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm just dense, but I don't get the point of this game that much. I don't enjoy it nearly as much as I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great game!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! I bought this because there were all my favorite characters like cratos, sly and more. On top of that they all have their own personal fighting powers that are original to their own game.
customer_reviews.author: Dezzi Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Gamers,try it out
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition, u need this game if ur a gamer but same time its alil tiny the figures but its really fun
customer_reviews.author: MCL

customer_reviews.title: great but get the ps3 version so you get 2 games for the price of one
customer_reviews.text: really enjoy this game. i would have bought the ps3 version if i realized it came with the vita version but the vita version doesnt come with the ps3 version.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: wish it had some of the more of the classic playstation characters.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a new ps vita slim, and was eager to get this game. When the game arrived, it was poorly packaged. IT DIDN'T WORK ON MY NEW VITA. It would even slide in, i tried it on my old vita, and the same thing happened. I strongly advise buying from somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Tyler M.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get that into it. They tried to do ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get that into it. They tried to do smash bro's and didn't quite make the grade. I'd buy if it's on sale
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Holt

customer_reviews.title: 60fps beautiful and imersive game!
customer_reviews.text: 60 fps on the vita it's visually stunning! amazing gameplay, lots of moves and characters to choose from all with unique style. I suggest this be one of the first games you pick up for the vita!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Used Game... Bought New.
customer_reviews.text: Game is okay... Online code did not work, and there was no expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: If you're a fan of fighting games, get this
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredibly well made game and a lot of fun, especially online. For fans of fighting games, you can go wrong, get this

customer_reviews.title: Up Up Down Down Square Triangle PUNCH
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Very fun. The only problem is downloading the updates. Took up an extra GB of memory on Vita just for that. Though that isn't the end of the world unless you got the small 4gb card.

customer_reviews.title: Clone
customer_reviews.text: It's basically Sony's answer to smash brothers smash brothers is better but this is a good start

customer_reviews.title: Good game
customer_reviews.text: This game will bring you back to the good ole smash brothers era. I love games like these, but I really enjoy the character selection in this one. I think you would enjoy as well

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Addicting
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite games on the playstation that I owned on the ps3 and now on the vita. The playstation version of super smash bros = more play time for me.

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: This game was a lot of fun to play though. It features many characters from recent and old Sony consoles/games. If you are a fan of Smash Bros this is definitely the closest thing to it. This is a must have

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would be like super smash, and while there are similarities, its ultimately not as good. Still a very fun and different fighter but it wont impress everyone

customer_reviews.title: This game es very funny

customer_reviews.title: Fun game but gets repititive.
customer_reviews.text: This game is very fun though it gets a bit repetitive very quick. This game is best when played online with friends as action with the AI gets stale quick.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: If you like Smash Bros then this is the game for you. Personally I dislike the Smash Bros games but I adore this title. Easily my favorite PS Vita game this far.

customer_reviews.title: Great game for your PS Vita
customer_reviews.text: The graphics are great for being a PS Vita game. The game is fast paced, fun, and I got it for $5 on Amazon deal price. Super good deal. Buy it.. you will love it.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game, awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Got this game on sale during the winter sales, if you own a PS vita, this is a worthy title. Not completely like the ps3 version but close enough to not really notice. Great game and a great deal!

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected!!!

customer_reviews.title: Play it all the time. Fun!

customer_reviews.title: Probably not
customer_reviews.text: Probably wouldn't recommend this to others. The game is awesome and love it for the Playstation 3 . But I would not recommend this on the PS Vita. It is very hard to control, the players are very small, and when the action begins, you lose track of your character since their just flying all over the place. Controlling is the most important part of this game and you don't have much of it. I love the game for the PS3 but not for the Vita
customer_reviews.author: Zordonn

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected. More of a fighting game than Super Smash Bros. with decent move combinations. Crash Bandicoot with Coco should have been in this game; not Big Daddy and Little Sister from Bioshock.

customer_reviews.title: Good Show, old chap!
customer_reviews.text: The game came brand new and shipped fast and on time. Overall, I have absolutely no complaints; Good show, old chap!

customer_reviews.title: Single player average, Multiplayer awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its plays well, have a good control system graphics as expected, but I find it lacking in actual gameplay. With today's current advances I really expected more out of the single player campaign, but if you have friends with Vita you can play with. Its a good game to ruin friendships, as with any free-for-all game. I dislike the use of a cheap lengthening scam to make the game longer if you wish to really complete it, by giving small collectables for using each character much in battle.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq C. J. Gumbs

customer_reviews.title: all_star

product_meta.title: PlayStation All-Stars Battle Royale
product_meta.description:
PS VITA AllStars Battle Royale PS Vita Games

AMAZON.COM




 How many times have you thought about your favorite PlayStation characters and asked yourself who would win in a fight? Would it be Sly Cooper or Kratos? Sweet Tooth or PaRappa the Rapper? Gamers everywhere engage in this argument, heatedly comparing skills, techniques and powers. Most of the time, it comes to a draw, or something close to it. But there's one thing these arguments can't take into consideration — you.





Challenge your favorite 
PlayStation characters



Competitive multiplayer action



Exciting battles

SYNOPSIS
 It's your time to prove once and for all that your favorite character and your skill make the ultimate gaming warrior in an epic Battle Royale that your friends will be talking about for months. Pit characters from all across the gaming spectrum against each other and watch the results unfold as they battle with unique techniques in a mash-up of interactive environments true to the games from which they came. Settle that age-old argument and play with your friends or test your favorite characters' skills online in some competitive multiplayer action. No matter how you take to the battlefield, one thing is certain — you've already chosen your side. Now it's time to back it up.



KEY FEATURES:
 * Challenge your favorite PlayStation characters from all over the gaming spectrum to epic, challenging, exciting battles that are addicting, enjoyable and easy-to-play
   
 * Become the battle commander to over 20 first- and third-party PlayStation characters, including Kratos, Sly Cooper, Sweet Tooth, PaRappa the Rapper and more, with a unique set of attacks and moves characteristic to the personalities you know and love
   
 * Obliterate your opponents online in competitive multiplayer action or face off with a group of friends to see whose favorite character is truly the ultimate warrior
   
 * Revisit each character's world in a mash-up of interactive environments created from different PlayStation games
feature_bullets: Play as your favorite PlayStation characters with all their signature moves
Dynamic environments straight from the characters' worlds
Interactive mash-up events featuring additional PlayStation characters
